short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password Generator — simple, secure, one-click password generator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate a random secure password in one click
The generator adds generated password to the dedicated field and copies it to the clipboard

You can specify:
— length of password
— used chars: lowercase, uppercase, digits, and special characters
— excluded chars
— hexadecimal only

Password configuration preferences are stored
Passwords history is stored

ChangeLog:
Version 1.0.0 on 19.07.2023
— First release
Version 1.0.1 on 27.09.2024
— Enhance preferences saving on any configuration change
